_description: An account of the life of King Arthur inserted in a Latin Chronicle — 642 lines in couplets

Longleat55.First Lines:
Herkeneþ þat loueþ honourOf Kyng Arthour and hys
                    labour…

Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Arthur.
